dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 840 IH: To improve services for victims of sexual assault and domestic violence.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan (for himself, Mrs. Christensen, Ms. Bordallo, and Ms. Moore) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To improve services for victims of sexual assault and domestic violence.

subsection.text: Paragraph (4) of section 14601(b) of the Violence Against Women Act of 1994 (42 U.S.C. 14043g(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking , except that the United States Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Guam, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands shall each be allocated 0.125 percent of the total appropriations; and

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to grants under section 14601 of the Violence Against Women Act of 1994 (42 U.S.C. 14043g) for fiscal year 2013 and succeeding fiscal years.
